import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlayerSection.module.css' class PlayerSection extends React.Component { state = { id : 1, data : '' } getId = () => { let vidId = this.props.location.pathname.split('/')[1] if(this.state.id !== 1) { this.setState(this.state.id = vidId) } } componentDidMount() { this.getId() axios.get(`https://5d76bf96515d1a0014085cf9.mockapi.io/video/${this.state.id}`) .then((response) => { this.setState( this.state.data = response.data ) console.log(this.state.data, 'mount') }) } render() { return (
) } } export default PlayerSection
